hash-length-help: Help message for the hash length field on Special:GenerateRandomHash.
hash-prefix-help: Help message for the prefix select field on Special:GenerateRandomHash.
removepii-oldname-label: Label for the old username field on Special:RemovePII.
removepii-newname-label: Label for the new username field on Special:RemovePII.
removepii-action-label: Label for the action select field on Special:RemovePII.
removepii-action-help: Help message for the action select field on Special:RemovePII.
removepii-warning-irreversible: Warning message to be shown when doing RemovePII action.
removepii-wiki-disabled: Message to be disabled on Special:RemovePII in replace of forum when disabled on that wiki.
removepii-centralauth-notinstalled: Error message to be displayed when attempting to submit Special:RemovePII when the CentralAuth extension is not installed.
